name: FileUpload
description: FileUpload is an advanced uploader with dragdrop support, multi file uploads, auto uploading, progress tracking and validations.

properties.name: accept
properties.description: Pattern to restrict the allowed file types such as "image/*".

properties.name: auto
properties.description: When enabled, upload begins automatically after selection is completed.

properties.name: cancelLabel
properties.description: Label of the cancel button. Defaults to global value in Locale configuration.

properties.name: cancelOptions
properties.description: Options used to customize the cancel button. These options have "label", "icon", "className" and "style" properties.

properties.name: children
properties.description: Used to get the child elements of the component.

properties.name: chooseLabel
properties.description: Label of the choose button. Defaults to global value in Locale configuration.

properties.name: chooseOptions
properties.description: Options used to customize the choose button. These options have "label", "icon", "className" and "style" properties.

properties.name: className
properties.description: Style class of the component.

properties.name: contentClassName
properties.description: Style class of the content.

properties.name: contentStyle
properties.description: Inline style of the content.

properties.name: customUpload
properties.description: Whether to use the default upload or a manual implementation defined in uploadHandler callback.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Disables the upload functionality.

properties.name: emptyTemplate
properties.description: Custom template of empty content in the container.

properties.name: headerClassName
properties.description: Custom template of the header.

properties.name: headerStyle
properties.description: Inline style of the header.

properties.name: headerTemplate
properties.description: Custom template of the header.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique identifier of the element.

properties.name: invalidFileSizeMessageDetail
properties.description: Detail message of the invalid fize size.

properties.name: invalidFileSizeMessageSummary
properties.description: Summary message of the invalid fize size.

properties.name: itemTemplate
properties.description: Custom template of each item content in the container.

properties.name: maxFileSize
properties.description: Maximum file size allowed in bytes.

properties.name: mode
properties.description: Defines the UI of the component, possible values are "advanced" and "basic".

properties.name: multiple
properties.description: Used to select multiple files at once from file dialog.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name of the request parameter to identify the files at backend.

properties.name: previewWidth
properties.description: Width of the image thumbnail in pixels.

properties.name: progressBarTemplate
properties.description: Custom template of progressBar content in the container.

properties.name: pt
properties.description: Uses to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

properties.name: ptOptions
properties.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

properties.name: removeIcon
properties.description: Icon of the remove element.

properties.name: selectedFileLabel
properties.description: Label of the choose button after a file is selected.

properties.name: style
properties.description: Inline style of the component.

properties.name: unstyled
properties.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

properties.name: uploadLabel
properties.description: Label of the upload button. Defaults to global value in Locale configuration.

properties.name: uploadOptions
properties.description: Options used to customize the upload button. These options have "label", "icon", "className" and "style" properties.

properties.name: url
properties.description: Remote url to upload the files.

properties.name: withCredentials
properties.description: Cross-site Access-Control requests should be made using credentials such as cookies, authorization headers or TLS client certificates.

callbacks.name: onBeforeDrop
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke before files dropped. Return false from callback to prevent drop.

callbacks.name: onBeforeSelect
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke before files are selected. Return false from callback to prevent selection.

callbacks.name: onBeforeSend
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke before file send begins to customize the request such as adding headers.

callbacks.name: onBeforeUpload
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke before file upload begins to customize the request such as post parameters before the files.

callbacks.name: onClear
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when files in queue are removed without uploading.

callbacks.name: onError
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke if file upload fails.

callbacks.name: onProgress
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when files are being uploaded.

callbacks.name: onRemove
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when a file is removed without uploading using clear button of a file.

callbacks.name: onSelect
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when files are selected.

callbacks.name: onUpload
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when file upload is complete.

callbacks.name: onValidationFail
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when a validation file fails.

callbacks.name: uploadHandler
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke in custom upload mode to upload the files manually.

methods.name: getUploadedFiles
methods.description: Gets the current uploaded files list.

methods.name: onFileSelect
methods.description: Handles file selection event and updates.

methods.name: setUploadedFiles
methods.description: Sets the current uploaded files list.
